roleset.name: defrost
roleset.note: THAW-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4, weather-57 (no roles for weather class). (from thaw.01-v)

example.name: arg1 subject
example.text: Insects there were on the world , but [they]]-1 were frozen solid during the night , [*-1]only to revive and thaw in the morning sun .

roleset.name: thaw_out: fully defrost
roleset.note: THAW_OUT-V NOTES: No VNcls specific to the VPC, but see classes for thaw.01. Ditto for FN. (from thaw.02-v)

example.name: partial total defrosting
example.text: Usually back in Concord by noon , there was just time to get partially thawed [*-1] out , refuel , and grab a bit of Mrs. Fogg 's hot broth before starting the second trip .
